[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=662802][img]https://i.imgur.com/i36UAgI.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums API Extension (HAX)[/color][/b]
[b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#FFFFFF]Xerotic[/color][/url][/b] has announced his release of HAX, a Javascript Library that can be used to help with development using the Hack Forums API. The library covers a wide array of class methods which will help to simplify and speed up your project. 

Some of the methods include:
[code]
getUser(uids, func, params={})
        uids: can be a single uid or an array  of uids (up to 20)
        func: a function that you want to be ran upon completion. Receives the result data as a parameter
        params: is a object of settings for the API call. Most HAX methods receive this (it can be omitted)
            async -> default true
            raw -> default false
            page -> default 1
            header -> default true
getPost(pids, func, params={})
        pids: takes a single PID
        func: a function that you want to be ran upon completion. Receives the result data as a parameter
        params: see getUser documentation above (it can be omitted)[/code]

Resources:
[url=https://github.com/xerotic/Hackforums-API-eXtension]Github Page[/url]
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5665556]HF API Documentation[/url]

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5801102]>>thread[/url][/size]


[b][color=#ffffff]Lounge Head Award[/color][/b]
The recently announced Lounge Head award [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/lounge.png[/img] has now been implemented and is given after meeting the three requirements listed below:
[list=1]
[*]Make 1000 posts in the Lounge forum within a 30 day period.
[*]If you get a Post Etiquette warning the time period adjusts to the time stamp of the warning.
[*]Posts do not count if they are moved out of Lounge or soft-deleted.
[/list]
Go to this page to view your progress or obtain the award:  https://hackforums.net/loungehead.php
[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5801124]>>thread[/url][/size]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Research Finds Lab-grown "Mini-tumors" Could aid Treatment[/color][/b] 
A group of researchers, led by those at The Institute of Cancer Research, have been looking into the possibility of utilizing "mini-tumors" to improve cancer treatment. A "mini-tumor" is just a small "ball of cancer" grown in a lab which can be injected with the biometric material of a patient. The "ball of cancer" can then be allowed to grow inside a gell naturally while being monitored. The study allowed the researchers to determine which drugs would be most effective at particular stages of growth. This quote from Dr. Nicola Valeri sums it all up nicely "We were able to look in incredible detail at how tumors responded to drugs – including patterns of gene activity and mutation, and even how the cancer would evolve in response to treatment." [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.cancerresearchuk.org/about-us/cancer-news/news-report/2018-02-22-lab-grown-mini-tumours-could-personalise-cancer-treatment]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Toxic Chemicals Found in E-Cigarette 'Vapors'[/color][/b] 
Extremely dangerous chemicals, such as lead, have been found in the vapors exhaled by some e-cigarette users. The researchers at John Hopkins University believe this cocktail of toxicity leak from the heating coils of the e-cigarettes. The study looked at the vapors of 56 separate e-cigarette owners. The team is hoping to use this study, and others like it, to push the Federal Drug Administration to regulate these manufacturers. Here is a quote from Ana María Rule, PhD. on the same topic "It's important for the FDA, the e-cigarette companies and vapers themselves to know that these heating coils, as currently made, seem to be leaking toxic metals--which then get into the aerosols that vapers inhale," I can not help but agree with the team.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/pnhnIu1.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Just Under 400kg of Cocaine Found in Russia’s Buenos Aires Embassy[/color][/b] 
Information from a 2016 sting operation including Argentine and Russian police have now been made public. At that time, Argentina’s security minister stated that “nearly 400 kilos of cocaine from the Russian embassy in Buenos Aires” has been discovered. Patricia Bullrich, the federal Minister of Security for Argentina, stated that the street price for the amount of cocaine found totals to nearly $50 million. In addition, she stated that the “gang of narco-criminals was trying to use the diplomatic courier service of the Russian embassy to ship the drugs to Europe.” It is to be believed that the intended location of this drug would conclude in either Russia or Germany. During this raid, Bullrich went on to state that the cocaine discovered was replaced with flower, along with the implementation of “monitoring devices” to track the delivery. Five suspects have been arrested – “two in Argentina and three in Russia.” [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.thejournal.ie/argentina-cocaine-3867152-Feb2018/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]World is told to Ignore Trump’s Tweets by top U.S. Officials[/color][/b] 
The constant debate back and forth regarding the Trump administration’s take on public relations is probably one that you’re familiar with or have at least heard of. Well, now, Democrats, Republicans, and “top national security officials” are now saying to direct your attention elsewhere, in efforts to no longer pay attention to President Trump’s tweets. The announcement took place at the “gather of Europe’s foreign policy elite” this past weekend. It is often viewed by many that politicians clash with the president’s user of Twitter and in the manner in which he displays himself – even Republicans that have received his approval. Donald often goes on Twitter to express his opinions on the controversial subject of the day. Prior to this, he has called out an insurmountable number of politicians, news publications, “fake news,” among many other varying topics.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/top-us-officials-tell-the-world-to-ignore-trumps-tweets/2018/02/18/bc605236-14a2-11e8-942d-16a950029788_story.html?utm_term=.15e94b943b5f]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Second Russian of the 2018 Winter Olympics Fails Doping Test[/color][/b] 
It is no secret that the Russians have had their doping scandals uncovered in the past. In 2016 at the Rio Olympics, “68 members of the Russian track and field team have been banned” due to their failed doping tests. During 2018, two Russian Olympians have been disqualified due to testing “positive for a performance-enhancing drug” (PED). This controversy serves as a blow to the country’s goal of attaining the “Olympic status” that they once had and was diminished just two years ago. On February 18, Nadezhda Sergeeva, a bobsledder representing Russia, “tested positive for a heart drug.” However, it seems as if this went unnoticed, seeing that just on February 13, her drug test came back negative for any PED. Alexander Krushelnitsky, who won a bronze medal in mixed-team curling, cooperated and further agreed to release his medal after he tested “positive for meldonium, which can aid in endurance.” The Russians still hope that the International Olympic Committee will allow them to march with the rest of their team on Sunday’s closing ceremony of the Pyeonchang 2018 Winter Olympics.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-olympics-2018-doping/second-russian-athlete-fails-doping-test-at-winter-games-idUSKCN1G712E]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sbnation.com/2016/7/22/12258488/russia-doping-scandal-suspensions-rio-olympics-2016]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/9ofBPAL.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Fortnite Season 3 Battle Pass Adds These New Rewards[/color][/b] 
Battle Royal games are still popular as ever. Surprisingly enough, Fortnite has definitely become more popular than when it was first originally released. The game has even beaten PUBG in certain aspects and Twitch streamers have been migrating over to Fortnite. Popular streamers and Shroud have a huge following. Whatever game they play their followers will be devoted no matter what. What is interesting though is that when both streamers are playing Fortnite, a majority of the attention is on that game rather than PUBG. Of course, if you read the first few sentences about their followers being devoted that is pretty much common sense. Now, to the actual information, season three of Fornite is here! If you purchase the season three battle pass using the in-game currency, you will have the chance to unlock new gliders, character skins, and much more exclusive items. In total, there are 76 items that a player can get inside of the season three battle pass. Tweaks have been made in the game and hopefully, you will see the improvements when playing. Also, console gamers have been given some new stuff too like FPS control options. Have you had any luck recently? Post your winnings on the HF News thread! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/fortnite-season-3-battle-pass-adds-these-new-rewar/1100-6456941/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Metal Gear Survive Co-Op Mission Type Coming Next Month[/color][/b] 
If you are not up to date with Konami or Metal Gear Solid games, there was recently a new release called Metal Gear Survive. Sometime next month players who own the game will be getting a brand new game mode. Team up with buddies or random players online and fight off hoards of zombies as you rescue soldiers! Titled, "Rescue Mission", players are given tasks that need to be completed in order to pass the mission. Co-operation is a must an in order to complete these tasks you must have patience and proper communication. In addition to the new game mode, certain tasks will be put in place as a bonus. When completed, a point modifier will reward you with certain useful items. As said before the game is out now and can be purchased on Xbox, PlayStation and PC! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/new-metal-gear-survive-co-op-mission-type-coming-n/1100-6456979/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Pokemon Go Legendary Week Offers Another Chance To Catch Groudon And More[/color][/b] 
If you missed the legendary Pokemon event that took place not too long ago, do not worry as Niantic will be bringing the event back. In the event, Pokemon lovers will have the chance to get their very own Groudon and much more! The second Pokemon Go Community day will be taking place on Feb. 24. Players will have the chance to earn extra bonuses and obtain rare Pokemon that cannot be captured outside of this event. The event will not be taking place anywhere specific so if you had the chance to participate you were able to do so by even roaming your own neighborhood. Those lucky enough to play earned triple stardust and the lure modules had an increased length of use for three hours. Dratini has been introduced and was available to capture. Originally when the game was mostly played during the botting era, people were able to put their location in Australia and farm dratini's. Now is your chance to get them legit and evolve into the all-mighty Dratini! If you were not able to participate in the Pokemon Go Day well you still have the chance to participate in Pokemon Go Week! Yep, a week of Pokemon exclusive events. Until March 5, you will be able to capture Groudon, Kyogre, and even Rayquaza. Good luck, trainers! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/pokemon-go-legendary-week-offers-another-chance-to/1100-6456967/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/q2F6BnS.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Harukana Receive Beach Volleyball Anime Casts Atsumi Tanezaki, Rie Suegara[/color][/b] 
Voice actresses for two characters in the new upcoming anime Harukana Receive have been revealed. Atsumi Tanezaki will be taking on the voice actress role of Kurea (Claire) Thomas while Rie Suegara will be voicing Emiri (Emily) Thomas. The two main characters of Harukana Receive are Haruka Ōzora and Kanata Higa. Both of them absolutely love to play beach volleyball, but to their dismay, there is something stopping them from playing which is their height. Haruka just so happens to be very tall while Kanata, on the other hand, is very short. With that being said, their height is causing them to want to quit the sport. However, the two team up and form a pair to participate as a team in beach volleyball. The manga adaption was released back in 2015 and the completion of the fourth volume was recently compiled last year in September. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-02-23/harukana-receive-beach-volleyball-anime-casts-atsumi-tanezaki-rie-suegara/.128204]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Sailor Moon Suits Up for Summer in Fresh Bikini Line[/color][/b] 
Sailor Moon can definitely be described as one of the most popular anime in the Shoujo genre. The Sailor Moon team has recently paired up with the Japanese brand Pameo Pose. The rise of popularity in cosplaying has risen tremendously over the years, many people are not as afraid to open up and dress up as their favorite characters. If you are one of those people then Sailor Moon has some new products that fans will totally love! Introducing the brand new Sailor Moon swimsuits, girls will be able to dress up as their favorite sailor soldier. The color choices have been chosen for the following girls: Sailor Moon, Mercury, Mars, Jupiter, Venus, Chibi Moon, Uranus, and Neptune. The swimsuits are amazingly cute and if you are into frilly clothing you will absolutely love them too. To take a quick peek at them you can [url=https://i.imgur.com/IaaFyKw.jpg]here[/url]. Not only are the swimsuits being sold, but other gear like shirts, pants, hair sticks, and even chokers will be available too! On March 14, fans will have the chance to purchase these items at Isetan Stores in Tokyo, Nagoya, and Osaka. If you are from outside Japan and are interested, there will probably be ways to get yourself some merchandise. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2018-02-23/sailor-moon-suits-up-for-summer-in-fresh-bikini-line/.128001]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]FuRyu's Pastel Memories Smartphone Game Gets TV Anime[/color][/b] 
It is truly great when a popular anime related game gets turned into an anime. In the past, this has happened many times and it is thanks to all the fans and supporters who love the game. In the game, you play as a store manager who runs a store that sells otaku items. If you are a weeaboo, then you will love this store of course. Set a little bit ahead of our time now, the interest in anime and such have declined. No one is into it anymore. The purpose of the store manager is to hire a bunch of cute girls who are not affected by a virus that is causing everyone to not have interest in anime. With their help, you work together to help bring back the memory of citizens and hopefully restore what has been lost. It is already cool that this game is getting an anime adaption but what is even cooler is that fact that the game was released last year in October. Is that not outstanding or what? Not even a year and already an anime is being made. Wow! At the current time, there is no release date. In addition, things that are not known include whether or not the voice actresses for the characters will be included as staff members and things along those lines. You can check out the JP trailer of the game [url=https://youtu.be/-CaAUOJqmwM]here[/url] though. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-02-23/furyu-pastel-memories-smartphone-game-gets-tv-anime/.128168]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 380
